```{r}
table(fish_file)
```

```{r}
fish_stats <- function(data.frame = fish_file){table(fish_file)
common <- sort(table(fish_file), decreasing = TRUE)[1]
rare <- sort(table(fish_file), increasing = TRUE)[1]
n <- nrow(fish_file)
return(common, rare, n)}
```
